rewrite1: Begin by altering the first paragraph's highlight color to the hex value #0000FF. Then, adjust the font size to a smaller 8 point scale. Finally, select 'Malgun Gothic' as the desired font style.
rewrite2: Begin by altering the highlight color of the initial paragraph to the hex code #0000FF. Then, adjust the font size to a smaller, 8-point scale. Finally, choose 'Malgun Gothic' from the font options to apply as the typeface for this section.
rewrite3: Begin by altering the highlight color of the initial paragraph to the hex value #0000FF. Next, adjust the font size to 8 points, and select Malgun Gothic as the typeface.
